body:
After the Mac OS update to Mojave there were some issues, so I decided to reinstall Spack. However, I got stuck with building even gcc. It gets stuck at gdbm.

---

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install gdbm

==> Installing gdbm
==> Searching for binary cache of gdbm
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for gdbm found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /Users/vikram/Downloads/Install/src/spack/var/spack/cache/gdbm/gdbm-1.18.1.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /var/folders/p5/zmhxh9795rzd9nn3115zbjb40000gn/T/vikram/spack-stage/gdbm-1.18.1-2h4wj2k4y4vzptp474wc4vj3gcriqq4n/gdbm-1.18.1.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /var/folders/p5/zmhxh9795rzd9nn3115zbjb40000gn/T/vikram/spack-stage/gdbm-1.18.1-2h4wj2k4y4vzptp474wc4vj3gcriqq4n
==> No patches needed for gdbm
==> Building gdbm [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 77:
    '/var/folders/p5/zmhxh9795rzd9nn3115zbjb40000gn/T/vikram/spack-stage/gdbm-1.18.1-2h4wj2k4y4vzptp474wc4vj3gcriqq4n/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/Users/vikram/Downloads/Install/src/spack/opt/spack/darwin-mojave-broadwell/clang-11.0.0-apple/gdbm-1.18.1-2h4wj2k4y4vzptp474wc4vj3gcriqq4n' '--enable-libgdbm-compat' 'CPPFLAGS=-D_GNU_SOURCE'

2 errors found in build log:
     10    checking for awk... awk
     11    checking whether make sets $(MAKE)... yes
     12    checking whether make supports nested variables... yes
     13    checking whether make supports nested variables... (cached) yes
     14    checking for gcc... gcc
     15    checking whether the C compiler works... no
  >> 16    configure: error: in `/var/folders/p5/zmhxh9795rzd9nn3115zbjb40000gn/T/vikramsingh/spack-stage/gdbm-1.18.1-2h4wj2k4y4vzptp474wc4vj3gcriqq4n/spack-src':
  >> 17    configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables
     18    See `config.log' for more details

See build log for details:
  /var/folders/p5/zmhxh9795rzd9nn3115zbjb40000gn/T/vikram/spack-stage/gdbm-1.18.1-2h4wj2k4y4vzptp474wc4vj3gcriqq4n/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Darwin Vikram.local 18.7.0 Darwin Kernel Version 18.7.0: Tue Aug 20 16:57:14 PDT 2019; root:xnu-4903.271.2~2/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64
``` 

To try and bypass this issue, I found that the following took me slightly forward but I get stuck again. 
### Additional Information

```console
$ CC="/opt/local/bin/gcc -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk" LD="/opt/local/bin/ld -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk" LDFLAGS="-isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX.sdk -L/usr/lib -lSystem" spack install cmake

==> Installing gdbm
==> Searching for binary cache of gdbm
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for gdbm found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /Users/vikram/Downloads/Install/src/spack/var/spack/cache/gdbm/gdbm-1.18.1.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /var/folders/p5/zmhxh9795rzd9nn3115zbjb40000gn/T/vikram/spack-stage/gdbm-1.18.1-2h4wj2k4y4vzptp474wc4vj3gcriqq4n/gdbm-1.18.1.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /var/folders/p5/zmhxh9795rzd9nn3115zbjb40000gn/T/vikram/spack-stage/gdbm-1.18.1-2h4wj2k4y4vzptp474wc4vj3gcriqq4n
==> No patches needed for gdbm
==> Building gdbm [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

6 errors found in build log:
     898     #define SIZE_T_MAX      ULONG_MAX       /* max value for a size_t */
     899    
     900      CCLD     libgdbm.la
     901      CCLD     gdbmtool
     902      CCLD     gdbm_load
     903      CCLD     gdbm_dump
  >> 904    Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
     905      "_history_list", referenced from:
     906          _input_history_handler in input-rl.o
     907    ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
  >> 908    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
  >> 909    make[3]: *** [gdbmtool] Error 1
     910    make[3]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
  >> 911    make[2]: *** [all] Error 2
  >> 912    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
  >> 913    make: *** [all] Error 2

```
title: Installation issue: gdbm
